text: Solaris () is a 1972 Soviet drama movie directed by Andrei Tarkovsky.Личный экземпляр сценария фильма «Солярис» Тарковского продали на аукционеСолярис It stars Donatas Banionis, Raimundas Banionis, and Natalya Bondarchuk. ==Actors== * Donatas Banionis as Kris Kelvin (voiced by Vladimir Zamansky) * Raimundas Banionis as young Kelvin * Natalya Bondarchuk as Hari * Jüri Järvet as Dr. Snaut (voiced by Vladimir Tatosov) * Vladislav Dvorzhetsky as Henri Burton * Nikolai Grinko as Kelvin's Father * Olga Barnet as Kelvin's Mother == References == ==Other websites== * Category:Russian science fiction movies Category:Russian drama movies Category:Movies directed by Andrei Tarkovsky Category:Russian-language movies Category:Movies about astronauts Category:1972 science fiction movies Category:Movies set on fictional planets Category:1972 drama movies Category:Soviet science fiction movies Category:Soviet drama movies
title: Solaris (1972 movie)
